activities.name: Robotics Club
activities.description: Designed autonomous navigation systems for competitive robots
activities.impact: Led team to state championship, mentored 15 younger students

activities.name: Volunteer Tutoring
activities.description: Tutored underprivileged students in algebra and geometry
activities.impact: Improved student grades by average of 1.2 letter grades

core_values.description: Belief in using technology to solve real-world problems
evidence: Created app for local food bank

defining_moments.title: First Programming Success
defining_moments.description: Creating my first working program that solved a real problem
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Overwhelming sense of accomplishment and purpose
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Technology can be a powerful tool for positive change

defining_moments.title: Helping Struggling Student
defining_moments.description: Tutoring a student who was failing math and seeing them succeed
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Deep satisfaction from making a difference
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Everyone learns differently; patience and adaptation are key
